comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: I believe it’s because the map tiles are out-of-sync with the API data. We’ll update the map tiles after HoT ships (because we’ve had issues with the process leaking data before).

comments.author: koenvu.7584
comments.body: I was playing with the maps endpoint to display the boundaries of zones on a world map, when I noticed that Dry Top and Silverwastes seem to overlap. I’m not sure if this is intentional or a bug? But this way it’s difficult when someone clicks on the map to determine which zone that is.
